Isochrones: opportunity for optional, necessary, and social activities (Helsinki, Espoo, Vantaa +)

Distribution of places for performing optional, necessary, and social activities, following from Gehl, within travel-time isochrones. (See more)

Buildings: purpose of use, and physical and functional attributes (Laajalahti bay area)

Laajalahti bay area buildings, categorized by use and visualized according to their physical and functional attributes, using Helsinki and Espoo datasets updated as of November 16, 2023. (See more)

Car traffic volumes (Espoo)

Car traffic volume over time (2018-2022), by road, in Espoo. (See more)

Buildings: purpose of use, and physical and functional attributes (area roughly mapping to Perkkaa)

Perkkaa buildings, categorized by use and visualized according to their physical and functional attributes, using Helsinki and Espoo datasets updated as of November 16, 2023. (See more)

Boarding passengers (HSL service area)

The number of boarding passengers on an average weekday (Monday-Friday) in November 2016, organised by stop. (See more)
